              class AnalyticsController < ApplicationController
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                before_action :authorize_request
          
      6.

                before_action :require_admin!
          
      7.

                # Mark all actions as public endpoints that don't require restaurant context
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                def public_endpoint?
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  true

                # GET /admin/analytics/customer_orders?start=YYYY-MM-DD&end=YYYY-MM-DD
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                def customer_orders
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  start_date = params[:start].present? ? Date.parse(params[:start]) : (Date.today - 30)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  end_date   = params[:end].present?   ? Date.parse(params[:end])   : Date.today
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  end_date = end_date.end_of_day
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  orders = Order
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    .includes(:user)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    .where(created_at: start_date..end_date)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    .where.not(status: 'cancelled')
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  # Group them by user or by guest contact info
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  grouped_orders = orders.group_by do |order|
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    if order.user_id.present?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                      "USER_#{order.user_id}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    else
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                      name_str  = order.contact_name.to_s.strip.downcase
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                      phone_str = order.contact_phone.to_s.strip.downcase
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      email_str = order.contact_email.to_s.strip.downcase
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      "GUEST_#{name_str}_#{phone_str}_#{email_str}"
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  report = grouped_orders.map do |_group_key, orders_in_group|
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    total_spent = orders_in_group.sum(&:total)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    order_count = orders_in_group.size
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    all_items = orders_in_group.flat_map(&:items)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    item_details = all_items.group_by { |i| i['name'] || 'Unknown' }.map do |item_name, lines|
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      {
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                        name: item_name,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                        quantity: lines.sum { |ln| ln['quantity'] || 1 }
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    first_order = orders_in_group.first
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    if first_order.user_id.present?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                      user_obj  = first_order.user
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      user_name = user_obj&.full_name.presence || user_obj&.email || 'Unknown User'
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                      user_id   = user_obj.id
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    else
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                      fallback_name = first_order.contact_name.presence ||
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                                      first_order.contact_phone.presence ||
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                                      first_order.contact_email.presence ||
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                                      'Unknown Guest'
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                      user_name = "Guest (#{fallback_name})"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                      user_id   = nil
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    {
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      user_id: user_id,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      user_name: user_name,
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      total_spent: total_spent.to_f.round(2),
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      order_count: order_count,
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                      items: item_details
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    }
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    start_date: start_date,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    end_date: end_date,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    results: report
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  }
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                # GET /admin/analytics/revenue_trend?interval=day|week|month&start=...&end=...
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                def revenue_trend
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  interval   = params[:interval].presence || 'day'
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  start_date = params[:start].present? ? Date.parse(params[:start]) : 30.days.ago
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  end_date   = params[:end].present?   ? Date.parse(params[:end])   : Date.today
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  end_date = end_date.end_of_day
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  orders = Order.where.not(status: 'cancelled').where(created_at: start_date..end_date)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  results = case interval
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  when 'week'
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    orders.group("extract(year from created_at), extract(week from created_at)")
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                          .select("extract(year from created_at) as yr, extract(week from created_at) as wk, SUM(total) as revenue")
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                          .order("yr, wk")
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  when 'month'
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    orders.group("extract(year from created_at), extract(month from created_at)")
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                          .select("extract(year from created_at) as yr, extract(month from created_at) as mon, SUM(total) as revenue")
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                          .order("yr, mon")
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  else # 'day'
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    orders.group("DATE(created_at)")
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                          .select("DATE(created_at) as date, SUM(total) as revenue")
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                          .order("DATE(created_at)")
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  data = results.map do |row|
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    if interval == 'day'
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                      { label: row.date, revenue: row.revenue.to_f.round(2) }
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    elsif interval == 'week'
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      { label: "Year #{row.yr.to_i} - Week #{row.wk.to_i}", revenue: row.revenue.to_f.round(2) }
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    else
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      { label: "Year #{row.yr.to_i}, Month #{row.mon.to_i}", revenue: row.revenue.to_f.round(2) }
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                    start_date: start_date,
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    end_date: end_date,
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    interval: interval,
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    data: data
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  }
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                # GET /admin/analytics/top_items?limit=5&start=...&end=...
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                def top_items
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  limit = (params[:limit] || 5).to_i
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  start_date = params[:start].present? ? Date.parse(params[:start]) : 30.days.ago
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  end_date   = params[:end].present?   ? Date.parse(params[:end])   : Date.today
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  end_date = end_date.end_of_day
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  orders = Order.where.not(status: 'cancelled').where(created_at: start_date..end_date)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  all_items = orders.flat_map(&:items)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  grouped = all_items.group_by { |i| i["name"] || "Unknown" }
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  results = grouped.map do |item_name, lines|
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    qty = lines.sum { |ln| ln["quantity"] || 1 }
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    rev = lines.sum { |ln| (ln["price"] || 0).to_f * (ln["quantity"] || 1) }
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    { item_name: item_name, quantity_sold: qty, revenue: rev.round(2) }
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  top = results.sort_by { |r| -r[:revenue] }.first(limit)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    start_date: start_date,
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    end_date: end_date,
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                    top_items: top
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  }
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                # GET /admin/analytics/income_statement?year=2025
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                def income_statement
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  year = (params[:year] || Date.today.year).to_i
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  year_start = Date.new(year, 1, 1).beginning_of_day
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  year_end   = year_start.end_of_year
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  orders = Order.where.not(status: 'cancelled').where(created_at: year_start..year_end)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  monthly = orders.group("extract(month from created_at)")
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                                  .select("extract(month from created_at) as mon, SUM(total) as revenue")
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                                  .order("mon")
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  # We'll map numeric months to names
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  month_names = %w[January February March April May June July August September October November December]
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  data = monthly.map do |row|
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    m_index = row.mon.to_i - 1
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    {
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                      month: month_names[m_index] || "Month #{row.mon.to_i}",
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                      revenue: row.revenue.to_f.round(2)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    }
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                    year: year,
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                    income_statement: data
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  }
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                private
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                def require_admin!
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  unless current_user && current_user.role.in?(%w[admin super_admin])
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    render json: { error: 'Forbidden' }, status: :forbidden
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

            end

                def index

                def allowed_origins

                # POST /admin/restaurant/allowed_origins

                def update_allowed_origins

                  restaurant = Restaurant.find(params[:restaurant_id] || current_user&.restaurant_id || 1)

                  if params[:allowed_origins].is_a?(Array)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    restaurant.allowed_origins = params[:allowed_origins]
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    if restaurant.save
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                      render json: { allowed_origins: restaurant.allowed_origins }
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    else
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      render json: { errors: restaurant.errors.full_messages }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  else
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    render json: { error: "allowed_origins must be an array" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                end
          
      34.

                def index

                  # Pagination

    17. 
            

            

                  per_page = (params[:per_page] || 10).to_i
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  # Sorting
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  # For simplicity, let's allow only a couple of fields, e.g. email or created_at.
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  sort_by  = params[:sort_by].presence_in(%w[email created_at]) || 'created_at'
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  sort_dir = params[:sort_dir] == 'asc' ? 'asc' : 'desc'
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  # Start building query
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  users = User.order("#{sort_by} #{sort_dir}")
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  # Search filter
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  if params[:search].present?
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    q = "%#{params[:search].downcase}%"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    users = users.where(
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      "lower(email) LIKE ? OR lower(first_name) LIKE ? OR lower(last_name) LIKE ?",
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      q, q, q
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    )
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  # Role filter
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  if params[:role].present? && params[:role] != 'all'
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    users = users.where(role: params[:role])
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39.

      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  total_count = users.count
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  # Apply pagination
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  users = users.offset((page - 1) * per_page).limit(per_page)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46.

    52. 
            

            

                end
          
      53.

                # POST /admin/users

                def create
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  user = User.new(user_params)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  # If admin didn't supply a password => generate random
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  if params[:password].blank?

    60.

                  if user.save
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    # Now send them an invite link (re-using your reset-password flow).
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    raw_token = user.generate_reset_password_token!
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    PasswordMailer.reset_password(user, raw_token).deliver_later
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68.

                # PATCH /admin/users/:id

                def update

                # DELETE /admin/users/:id

                def destroy
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  user = User.find(params[:id])
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  # Prevent deleting self
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  if user.id == current_user.id
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    return render json: { error: "Cannot delete your own account" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  # Check if this is the last admin
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  if user.role.in?(%w[admin super_admin]) && User.where(role: %w[admin super_admin]).count <= 1
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    return render json: { error: "Cannot delete the last admin user" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    # Start a transaction
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      # Nullify user_id in associated orders
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                      Order.where(user_id: user.id).update_all(user_id: nil)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                      
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      # Now delete the user
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      user.destroy!
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    head :no_content
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error("Failed to delete user: #{e.message}")
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    render json: { error: "Failed to delete user: #{e.message}" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116.

                # POST /admin/users/:id/resend_invite
          
      117.

                def resend_invite
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  user = User.find(params[:id])
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  # Re-generate reset token & re-send the same "reset password" email
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  raw_token = user.generate_reset_password_token!

      123.

                  render json: { message: "Invitation re-sent to #{user.email}" }, status: :ok
          
      124.

                end
          
      125.

                private

                def require_admin!
          
      129.

                  unless current_user && current_user.role.in?(%w[admin super_admin])
          
      130.

                # Admin cant directly set user password => no :password param

            class ApplicationController < ActionController::API
          
      4.

              1
            

            

              include RestaurantScope

              def authorize_request
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              33
            

            

                header = request.headers['Authorization']
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
              33
            

            

                token = header.split(' ').last if header
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                begin
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
              33
            

            

                  decoded = JWT.decode(token, Rails.application.secret_key_base)[0]
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  @current_user = User.find(decoded['user_id'])
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # Check token expiration if exp is present
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  if decoded['exp'].present? && Time.at(decoded['exp']) < Time.current
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    render json: { errors: 'Token expired' }, status: :unauthorized
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    return
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
              33
            

            

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound, JWT::DecodeError
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
              33
            

            

                  render json: { errors: 'Unauthorized' }, status: :unauthorized
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23.

              1
            

            

              def current_user
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
              171
            

            

                @current_user
          
      25.

              end
          
      26.

              # optional_authorize tries to decode the token if present but doesn't fail if invalid
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
              1
            

            

              def optional_authorize
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                header = request.headers['Authorization']
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                token = header.split(' ').last if header
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                return unless token  # no token => do nothing => user remains nil
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                begin
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  # Use the same decode logic & secret as authorize_request
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  decoded = JWT.decode(token, Rails.application.secret_key_base)[0]
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  @current_user = User.find(decoded['user_id'])
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  # Check token expiration if exp is present
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  return if decoded['exp'].present? && Time.at(decoded['exp']) < Time.current
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound, JWT::DecodeError
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  # do nothing => user stays nil
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
              1
            

            

              def is_admin?
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                current_user && current_user.role.in?(%w[admin super_admin])
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            end

            class AvailabilityController < ApplicationController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :optional_authorize
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Mark this as a public endpoint that doesn't require restaurant context
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def public_endpoint?
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                true

              # GET /availability?date=YYYY-MM-DD&party_size=4&restaurant_id=1
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              def index
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                date_str   = params[:date]
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                party_size = params[:party_size].to_i
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                # Get restaurant from current context or from params
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                restaurant = if @current_restaurant
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                               @current_restaurant
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                             elsif params[:restaurant_id].present?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                               Restaurant.find_by(id: params[:restaurant_id])
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                             else
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                               render json: { error: "Restaurant ID is required" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                               return
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                             end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # 1) Generate local timeslots for that date
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                slots = generate_timeslots_for_date(restaurant, date_str)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                # 2) For each slot => check capacity in can_accommodate?
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                average_dining_duration = restaurant.default_reservation_length.minutes
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                available_slots = []
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                slots.each do |slot|
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  slot_end = slot + average_dining_duration
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  if can_accommodate?(restaurant, party_size, slot, slot_end)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    available_slots << slot
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # Return them in HH:MM format
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  slots: available_slots.map { |ts| ts.strftime("%H:%M") }
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                }
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              private
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              def generate_timeslots_for_date(restaurant, date_str)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                return [] if date_str.blank?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                return [] unless restaurant.time_zone.present?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                Time.use_zone(restaurant.time_zone) do
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  local_date = Time.zone.parse(date_str) # => e.g. 2025-02-10 00:00
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  return [] unless local_date
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  wday = local_date.wday
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  oh = OperatingHour.find_by(restaurant_id: restaurant.id, day_of_week: wday)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  # If no OperatingHour or its closed => no slots
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  return [] if oh.nil? || oh.closed?
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  base_open  = local_date.change(hour: oh.open_time.hour,  min: oh.open_time.min)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  base_close = local_date.change(hour: oh.close_time.hour, min: oh.close_time.min)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  # Check if there's a SpecialEvent for this date
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  event = SpecialEvent.find_by(restaurant_id: restaurant.id, event_date: local_date.to_date)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  # 1) If event is fully closed => no slots
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  return [] if event&.closed?
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  # 2) If event.exclusive_booking => maybe just 1 big slot at base_open
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  if event&.exclusive_booking
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    # Return single slot => [ 09:00 for example ]
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    return [base_open]
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  # 3) If event.start_time + event.end_time exist => clamp open/close times
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  if event&.start_time.present? && event&.end_time.present?
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    # This is a partial day event. We'll generate normal increments but only in [event.start_time..event.end_time]
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    event_start = local_date.change(hour: event.start_time.hour, min: event.start_time.min)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    event_end   = local_date.change(hour: event.end_time.hour,   min: event.end_time.min)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    base_open  = [base_open,  event_start].max
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    base_close = [base_close, event_end].min
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    return [] if base_close <= base_open
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  # 4) If the event wants exactly ONE slot at event.start_time => e.g. 09:00
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  #    We can do a check for "special_event indicates single_time_only"
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  #    or if event.start_time is present but you want only that slot.
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  #    For example:
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  if event && event.start_time.present? && event.end_time.blank?
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    # user says => only show one timeslot => event.start_time
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    single_slot = local_date.change(
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      hour: event.start_time.hour,
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      min:  event.start_time.min
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    )
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    return [single_slot] # just one slot
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  # If no special logic => build normal half-hour increments
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  interval = restaurant.time_slot_interval || 30
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  slots = []
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  current_slot = base_open
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  while current_slot < base_close
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    slots << current_slot
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    current_slot += interval.minutes
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  slots
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              def can_accommodate?(restaurant, party_size, start_dt, end_dt)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                total_seats = restaurant.current_seats.count
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                return false if total_seats.zero?
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                event = SpecialEvent.find_by(
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  restaurant_id: restaurant.id,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  event_date:    start_dt.to_date
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                )
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                # If day is closed => block
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                return false if event&.closed?
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                # If exclusive => block if any existing reservation is on that day
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                if event&.exclusive_booking
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  day_start = start_dt.beginning_of_day
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  day_end   = start_dt.end_of_day
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  existing = restaurant.reservations
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                    .where.not(status: %w[canceled finished no_show])
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    .where("start_time < ? AND end_time > ?", day_end, day_start)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  return existing.empty?
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                # If there's a max_capacity => ensure we don't exceed it
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                if event&.max_capacity&.positive?
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  day_start = start_dt.beginning_of_day
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  day_end   = start_dt.end_of_day
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  day_reservations = restaurant.reservations
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    .where.not(status: %w[canceled finished no_show])
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    .where("start_time < ? AND end_time > ?", day_end, day_start)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  used = day_reservations.sum(:party_size)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  return false if (used + party_size) > event.max_capacity
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                # Normal seat overlap logic
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                overlapping = restaurant.reservations
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  .where.not(status: %w[canceled finished no_show])
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  .where("start_time < ? AND end_time > ?", end_dt, start_dt)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                already_booked = overlapping.sum(:party_size)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                (already_booked + party_size) <= total_seats
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

              end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            end
          
      152.

    app/controllers/categories_controller.rb

            class CategoriesController < ApplicationController

              # No admin requirement here, so all users (or guests) can call index:

              before_action :optional_authorize, only: [:index]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Mark index as a public endpoint that doesn't require restaurant context
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def public_endpoint?
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                action_name == 'index'
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              end
          
      10.

            module RestaurantScope
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              1
            

            

              extend ActiveSupport::Concern
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            

              included do
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            

                before_action :set_restaurant_scope
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              
          
      9.

              1
            

            

              private
          
      10.

      11.

              1
            

            

              def set_restaurant_scope
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # For super_admin users who can access multiple restaurants
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
              91
            

            

                if current_user&.role == 'super_admin'
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  # Allow super_admin to specify which restaurant to work with
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
              2
            

            

                  @current_restaurant = if params[:restaurant_id].present?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
              1
            

            

                                         Restaurant.find_by(id: params[:restaurant_id])
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                                       else
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
              1
            

            

                                         nil # Super admins can access global endpoints without restaurant context
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                                       end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                else
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  # For regular users, always use their associated restaurant
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
              89
            

            

                  @current_restaurant = current_user&.restaurant
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  # If no restaurant is associated and this isn't a public endpoint,
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  # return an error
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
              89
            

            

                  unless @current_restaurant || public_endpoint?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
              32
            

            

                    render json: { error: "Restaurant context required" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
              32
            

            

                    return
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # Make current_restaurant available to models for default scoping
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                # This requires adding thread_mattr_accessor to ApplicationRecord
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
              59
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.current_restaurant = @current_restaurant if ActiveRecord::Base.respond_to?(:current_restaurant=)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              end
          
      36.

              # Override this method in controllers that have public endpoints

              def public_endpoint?

            # app/controllers/layouts_controller.rb
