            class LayoutsController < ApplicationController
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :authorize_request
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_layout, only: [:show, :update, :destroy, :activate]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # GET /layouts
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def index
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                if current_user.role == 'super_admin'
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  layouts = Layout.all
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                else
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  layouts = Layout.where(restaurant_id: current_user.restaurant_id)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                render json: layouts
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              # GET /layouts/:id
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              def show
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                seat_sections = @layout.seat_sections.includes(:seats)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                # Grab seat allocations still active.
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                seat_allocations = SeatAllocation
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  .includes(:reservation, :waitlist_entry)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  .where(seat_id: seat_sections.flat_map(&:seats).pluck(:id), released_at: nil)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                occupant_map = {}
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                seat_allocations.each do |alloc|
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  occupant = alloc.reservation || alloc.waitlist_entry
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  occupant_map[alloc.seat_id] = {
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    occupant_type:       alloc.reservation_id ? "reservation" : "waitlist",
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    occupant_name:       occupant.contact_name,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    occupant_party_size: occupant.try(:party_size),
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    occupant_status:     occupant.status
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  }
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # Re-build a consistent 'sections_data' that includes floor_number
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                # so the front-end sees it in the "sections_data" JSON.
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                rebuilt_sections_data = {
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  sections: seat_sections.map do |sec|
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    {
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                      id:          sec.id.to_s, # or just sec.id if you prefer
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      name:        sec.name,
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                      type:        sec.section_type,  # "table" or "counter"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                      orientation: sec.orientation,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      offsetX:     sec.offset_x,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                      offsetY:     sec.offset_y,
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      floorNumber: sec.floor_number,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                      seats: sec.seats.map do |seat|
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                        {
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                          id:         seat.id,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                          label:      seat.label,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                          position_x: seat.position_x,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                          position_y: seat.position_y,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                          capacity:   seat.capacity
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                        }
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                      end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    }
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                }
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                data = {
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  id:            @layout.id,
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  name:          @layout.name,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  sections_data: rebuilt_sections_data,  # replace raw @layout.sections_data
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  seat_sections: seat_sections.map do |sec|
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    {
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                      id:           sec.id,
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      name:         sec.name,
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      section_type: sec.section_type,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      offset_x:     sec.offset_x,
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      offset_y:     sec.offset_y,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                      orientation:  sec.orientation,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      floor_number: sec.floor_number,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                      seats: sec.seats.map do |seat|
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                        occ = occupant_map[seat.id]
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                        {
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                          id:         seat.id,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                          label:      seat.label,
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                          position_x: seat.position_x,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                          position_y: seat.position_y,
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                          capacity:   seat.capacity,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                          status:     occ ? "occupied" : "free",
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                          occupant_info: occ
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                        }
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    }
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                }
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                render json: data
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

              end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              # POST /layouts
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              def create
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                assigned_restaurant_id = 
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  if current_user.role == 'super_admin'
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    layout_params[:restaurant_id]
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  else
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    current_user.restaurant_id
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                @layout = Layout.new(
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  name:           layout_params[:name],
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  restaurant_id:  assigned_restaurant_id,
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  sections_data:  layout_params[:sections_data] || {}
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                )
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  if @layout.save!
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                    sections_array = layout_params.dig(:sections_data, :sections) || []
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    section_ids_in_use = []
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    sections_array.each do |sec_data|
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                      existing_section_id = sec_data["id"].to_i if sec_data["id"].to_s.match?(/^\d+$/)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                      seat_section = existing_section_id && existing_section_id > 0 ? 
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                                       @layout.seat_sections.find_by(id: existing_section_id) : nil
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      seat_section ||= @layout.seat_sections.build
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                      seat_section.name         = sec_data["name"]
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                      seat_section.section_type = sec_data["type"]       # "table" or "counter"
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                      seat_section.orientation  = sec_data["orientation"]
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                      seat_section.offset_x     = sec_data["offsetX"]
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                      seat_section.offset_y     = sec_data["offsetY"]
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                      # Always set floor_number if the client sends it:
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                      seat_section.floor_number = sec_data["floorNumber"] if sec_data.key?("floorNumber")
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                      seat_section.save!
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                      section_ids_in_use << seat_section.id
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                      seats_array    = sec_data["seats"] || []
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                      seat_ids_in_use = []
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                      seats_array.each do |seat_data|
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                        existing_seat_id = seat_data["id"].to_i if seat_data["id"].to_s.match?(/^\d+$/)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                        seat = existing_seat_id && existing_seat_id > 0 ? 
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                                 seat_section.seats.find_by(id: existing_seat_id) : nil
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                        seat ||= seat_section.seats.build
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                        seat.label       = seat_data["label"]
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                        seat.position_x  = seat_data["position_x"]
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                        seat.position_y  = seat_data["position_y"]
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                        seat.capacity    = seat_data["capacity"] || 1
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                        seat.save!
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                        seat_ids_in_use << seat.id
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                      end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                      # remove any seats that are no longer in the incoming array
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                      seat_section.seats.where.not(id: seat_ids_in_use).destroy_all
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    # Clean up old sections not in use
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    @layout.seat_sections.where.not(id: section_ids_in_use).destroy_all
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    @layout.save!
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    render json: @layout, status: :created
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  else
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    render json: { errors: @layout.errors.full_messages }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error("Layout creation failed => #{e.message}")
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                render json: { error: e.message }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

              # PATCH/PUT /layouts/:id
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              def update
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                if current_user.role != 'super_admin'
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  @layout.restaurant_id = current_user.restaurant_id
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                elsif layout_params[:restaurant_id].present?
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  @layout.restaurant_id = layout_params[:restaurant_id]
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                @layout.name = layout_params[:name] if layout_params[:name]
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                @layout.sections_data = layout_params[:sections_data] if layout_params.key?(:sections_data)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                sections_array = layout_params.dig(:sections_data, :sections) || []
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  section_ids_in_use = []
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  sections_array.each do |sec_data|
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                    existing_section_id = sec_data["id"].to_i if sec_data["id"].to_s.match?(/^\d+$/)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                    seat_section = existing_section_id && existing_section_id > 0 ? 
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                                     @layout.seat_sections.find_by(id: existing_section_id) : nil
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    seat_section ||= @layout.seat_sections.build
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                    seat_section.name         = sec_data["name"]
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                    seat_section.section_type = sec_data["type"]
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                    seat_section.orientation  = sec_data["orientation"]
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                    seat_section.offset_x     = sec_data["offsetX"]
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                    seat_section.offset_y     = sec_data["offsetY"]
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                    # Always set floor_number if the client sends it
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    seat_section.floor_number = sec_data["floorNumber"] if sec_data.key?("floorNumber")
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                    seat_section.save!
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    section_ids_in_use << seat_section.id
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                    seats_array   = sec_data["seats"] || []
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                    seat_ids_in_use = []
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                    seats_array.each do |seat_data|
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                      existing_seat_id = seat_data["id"].to_i if seat_data["id"].to_s.match?(/^\d+$/)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                      seat = existing_seat_id && existing_seat_id > 0 ? 
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                               seat_section.seats.find_by(id: existing_seat_id) : nil
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                      seat ||= seat_section.seats.build
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                      seat.label       = seat_data["label"]
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                      seat.position_x  = seat_data["position_x"]
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                      seat.position_y  = seat_data["position_y"]
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                      seat.capacity    = seat_data["capacity"] || 1
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                      seat.save!
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                      seat_ids_in_use << seat.id
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                    end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    seat_section.seats.where.not(id: seat_ids_in_use).destroy_all
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                  end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  # remove old seat_sections not in use
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  @layout.seat_sections.where.not(id: section_ids_in_use).destroy_all
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  @layout.save!
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                render json: @layout
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error("Error updating layout with seat sections: #{e.message}")
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                render json: { errors: [e.message] }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

              end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

            
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              # DELETE /layouts/:id
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

              def destroy
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                @layout.destroy
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                head :no_content
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

              end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

              # POST /layouts/:id/activate
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

              def activate
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                unless current_user.role.in?(%w[admin staff super_admin])
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Forbidden" }, status: :forbidden
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

            
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                if @layout.restaurant_id != current_user.restaurant_id && current_user.role != 'super_admin'
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Layout does not belong to your restaurant" }, status: :forbidden
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                @layout.restaurant.update!(current_layout_id: @layout.id)
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  message: "Layout #{@layout.name} (ID #{@layout.id}) is now active for Restaurant #{@layout.restaurant_id}"
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                }, status: :ok
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

              end
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

            
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

              private
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

            
          
      256.

              def set_layout
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                @layout = Layout.find(params[:id])
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

              end
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

            
          
      260.

              def layout_params
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261.

    262. 
            

            

              end
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

            end

              # 1) For index & show, optional_authorize => public can see
          
      3.

              before_action :optional_authorize, only: [:index, :show]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # 2) For other actions, require token + admin
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              before_action :authorize_request, except: [:index, :show]

              # GET /menu_items

              def index
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                # If admin AND params[:show_all] => show all. Otherwise only unexpired.
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                if is_admin? && params[:show_all].present?
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  base_scope = MenuItem.all
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                else
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  base_scope = MenuItem.currently_available
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                # Sort by name

    23.

      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # Category filter if present => now uses many-to-many:
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                # e.g. ?category_id=3
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                if params[:category_id].present?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  base_scope = base_scope.joins(:categories).where(categories: { id: params[:category_id] })
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                items = base_scope.includes(option_groups: :options)

    32.

                render json: items.as_json(
          
      34.

      35.

              def create
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "=== MenuItemsController#create ==="
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                return render json: { error: "Forbidden" }, status: :forbidden unless is_admin?
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                @menu_item = MenuItem.new(menu_item_params.except(:image, :category_ids))

    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71.

    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  # Assign categories if category_ids param is given

                  if params[:menu_item][:category_ids].present?
          
      76.

                    @menu_item.category_ids = params[:menu_item][:category_ids]
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  # Handle image upload if present
          
      80.

                  file = menu_item_params[:image]
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  if file.present? && file.respond_to?(:original_filename)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    ext = File.extname(file.original_filename)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    new_filename = "menu_item_#{@menu_item.id}_#{Time.now.to_i}#{ext}"
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    public_url   = S3Uploader.upload(file, new_filename)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    @menu_item.update!(image_url: public_url)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  render json: @menu_item, status: :created
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                else
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90.

      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91.

                Rails.logger.info "=== MenuItemsController#destroy ==="
          
      130.

      132.

              # (Optional) POST /menu_items/:id/upload_image

              def upload_image
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "=== MenuItemsController#upload_image ==="
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                return render json: { error: "Forbidden" }, status: :forbidden unless is_admin?
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                menu_item = MenuItem.find(params[:id])
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                file = params[:image]
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                unless file
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "No file param"
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: 'No image file uploaded' }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                ext = File.extname(file.original_filename)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                new_filename = "menu_item_#{menu_item.id}_#{Time.now.to_i}#{ext}"
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                public_url   = S3Uploader.upload(file, new_filename)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                menu_item.update!(image_url: public_url)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "menu_item updated => image_url: #{menu_item.image_url.inspect}"
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                render json: menu_item, status: :ok
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

              end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              private

              def menu_item_params

                params.require(:menu_item).permit(

      178.

      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  :featured,

              # GET /menus

            end

              def create
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                # Optional decode of JWT for user lookup, treat as guest if invalid
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
              5
            

            

                if request.headers['Authorization'].present?
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
              4
            

            

                  token = request.headers['Authorization'].split(' ').last
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
              4
            

            

                    decoded = JWT.decode(token, Rails.application.secret_key_base, true, algorithm: 'HS256')[0]
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    user_id = decoded['user_id']
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    found_user = User.find_by(id: user_id)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    @current_user = found_user if found_user
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54.

      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    # do nothing => treat as guest
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56.

      57.

    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59.

              5

      144.

                      txt_body = "Hi #{order.contact_name.presence || 'Customer'}, your order ##{order.id} "\

              def destroy
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                order = Order.find(params[:id])
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                return render json: { error: "Forbidden" }, status: :forbidden unless can_edit?(order)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                order.destroy
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                head :no_content
          
      185.

      186.

              private

              1
            

            

              def can_edit?(order)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                return true if current_user&.role.in?(%w[admin super_admin])
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                current_user && order.user_id == current_user.id
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              # For admins: allow editing everything
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
              1
            

            

              def order_params_admin
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
              5
            

            

                params.require(:order).permit(
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  :restaurant_id,
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  :user_id,
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  :status,
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  :total,
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  :promo_code,
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202.

            class PasswordsController < ApplicationController
          
      4.

              # Mark forgot and reset as public endpoints that don't require restaurant context
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def public_endpoint?
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                action_name.in?(['forgot', 'reset'])
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8.

              # POST /password/forgot
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              def forgot
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                user = User.find_by(email: params[:email].to_s.downcase)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                if user
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # 1) Generate the reset token
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  raw_token = user.generate_reset_password_token!
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  # 2) Send the email with the raw token
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  PasswordMailer.reset_password(user, raw_token).deliver_later
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                # Return a generic message to avoid email enumeration
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                render json: { message: "If that email exists, a reset link has been sent." }
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              # PATCH /password/reset
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              def reset
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                # Because we encoded email, Rails automatically decodes it here.
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                user = User.find_by(email: params[:email].to_s.downcase)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                unless user
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Invalid link or user not found" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # Check if the token is valid & not expired
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                unless user.reset_token_valid?(params[:token])
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Invalid or expired token" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                # Update the users password
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                user.password = params[:new_password]
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                user.password_confirmation = params[:new_password_confirmation]
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                if user.save
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  # Clear token so it cant be reused
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  user.clear_reset_password_token!
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  # Generate a new JWT so the user can be auto-logged in
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  jwt = JWT.encode({ user_id: user.id }, Rails.application.secret_key_base)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  # Return both the token and the user object => front end can store them
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    message: "Password updated successfully.",
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    jwt: jwt,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    user: user
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  }, status: :ok
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                else
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  render json: { errors: user.errors.full_messages }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            end
          
      59.

            class ReservationsController < ApplicationController

              def index

                scope = Reservation.where(restaurant_id: current_user.restaurant_id)

                # Date filter...

                if params[:date].present?

                  begin
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    date_filter = Date.parse(params[:date])

    19. 
            

            

                    restaurant = Restaurant.find(current_user.restaurant_id)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    tz = restaurant.time_zone.presence || "Pacific/Guam"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    start_local = Time.use_zone(tz) { Time.zone.local(date_filter.year, date_filter.month, date_filter.day, 0, 0, 0) }
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    end_local   = start_local.end_of_day

    27.

      28.

                reservations = scope.all

              def show

                end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                reservation = Reservation.find(params[:id])
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54.

                render json: reservation.as_json(

                  only: [

              # Public create

              def create

    68. 
            

            

                # ---- DEBUG LOGGING ----
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "DEBUG: raw params = #{params.inspect}"
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                # This calls strong params. Let's log what we get back:

                # 1) Manually parse start_time from reservation_params

    77. 
            

            

                if reservation_params[:start_time].present?
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78.

      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  if parsed_start.nil?
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    return render json: { error: "Invalid start_time format" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82.

      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                # 2) If an end_time was passed
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                if reservation_params[:end_time].present?
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  parsed_end = Time.zone.parse(reservation_params[:end_time])
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Invalid end_time format" }, status: :unprocessable_entity if parsed_end.nil?
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  @reservation.end_time = parsed_end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                else
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  # If your model sets end_time automatically based on duration_minutes, 
          
      92.

                  # you can skip assigning it here.
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93.

      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                # 3) Copy other fields from reservation_params

                @reservation.restaurant_id       = reservation_params[:restaurant_id]

      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                # 4) seat_preferences: need seat_preferences: [[]] in strong parameters

                if reservation_params[:seat_preferences].present?

    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113.

                # If staff/admin, force the restaurant_id

      115.

                  @reservation.restaurant_id = current_user.restaurant_id
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                else
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  # If no user or super_admin, default to 1 if not provided
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  @reservation.restaurant_id ||= 1
          
      119.

      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                # Require a valid start_time
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                unless @reservation.start_time

      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124.

      125.

      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                # 5) Check capacity
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                restaurant = Restaurant.find(@reservation.restaurant_id)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                if exceeds_capacity?(restaurant, @reservation.start_time, @reservation.end_time, @reservation.party_size)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Not enough seats for that timeslot" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                # ---- DEBUG: see what's in memory right before save
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "DEBUG: about to save. @reservation.seat_preferences = #{@reservation.seat_preferences.inspect}"
          
      134.

                if @reservation.save

                  # Optionally send a confirmation email

      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142.

                    message_body = <<~MSG.squish
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                      Hi #{@reservation.contact_name}, your Hafaloha reservation is confirmed
          
      146.

      147.

      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                      We look forward to seeing you!
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    MSG
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150.

      151.

      152.

      154.

      162.

              1
            

            

              def update
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                unless current_user && %w[admin staff super_admin].include?(current_user.role)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Forbidden: staff/admin only" }, status: :forbidden
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                reservation = Reservation.find(params[:id])
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                if reservation.update(reservation_params)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  render json: reservation, status: :ok
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171.

      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  render json: { errors: reservation.errors.full_messages }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

              end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176.

              def destroy
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177.

                reservation = Reservation.find(params[:id])

                head :no_content

              private
