              def reservation_params
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                allowed = params.require(:reservation).permit(
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  :restaurant_id,
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  :start_time,
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  :end_time,
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  :party_size,
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  :contact_name,
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  :contact_phone,
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  :contact_email,
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  :deposit_amount,
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  :reservation_source,
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  :special_requests,
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  :status,
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  :duration_minutes
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  # Not seat_preferences here
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                )
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

              
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                # Manually insert seat_preferences if present
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                if params[:reservation].key?(:seat_preferences)
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  allowed[:seat_preferences] = params[:reservation][:seat_preferences]
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

              
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                allowed
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

              end  
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
              1
            

            

              def exceeds_capacity?(restaurant, start_dt, end_dt, new_party_size)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                total_seats = restaurant.current_seats.count
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                return true if total_seats.zero?
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                # Overlapping reservations: same restaurant, not canceled/finished/no_show,
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                # and time range overlaps
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                overlapping = restaurant
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                                .reservations
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                                .where.not(status: %w[canceled finished no_show])
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                                .where("start_time < ? AND end_time > ?", end_dt, start_dt)
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

            
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                already_booked = overlapping.sum(:party_size)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                (already_booked + new_party_size) > total_seats
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

              end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

            end
          
      228.

    app/controllers/restaurants_controller.rb

    43.18% lines covered

    44 relevant lines. 19 lines covered and 25 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # app/controllers/restaurants_controller.rb

              1
            

            

            class RestaurantsController < ApplicationController
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              1
            

            

              before_action :authorize_request, except: [:show]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
              1
            

            

              before_action :set_restaurant, only: [:show, :update, :destroy]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Override public_endpoint? to mark index, show, and update as public endpoints
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
              1
            

            

              def public_endpoint?
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              19
            

            

                action_name.in?(['index', 'show', 'update'])
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              # GET /restaurants
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
              1
            

            

              def index
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                if current_user.role == "super_admin"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  @restaurants = Restaurant.all
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                else
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  @restaurants = Restaurant.where(id: current_user.restaurant_id)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                render json: @restaurants.map { |r| restaurant_json(r) }
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              # GET /restaurants/:id
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
              1
            

            

              def show
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                # Skip authorization check for public access
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
              1
            

            

                if current_user.present?
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  unless current_user.role == "super_admin" || current_user.restaurant_id == @restaurant.id

              def restaurant_params

              def restaurant_json(restaurant)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                {
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
              1
            

            

                  id:                         restaurant.id,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  name:                       restaurant.name,
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  address:                    restaurant.address,
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  phone_number:               restaurant.phone_number,
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  layout_type:                restaurant.layout_type,
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  current_layout_id:          restaurant.current_layout_id,
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  default_reservation_length: restaurant.default_reservation_length,
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  time_slot_interval:         restaurant.time_slot_interval,
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  time_zone:                  restaurant.time_zone,
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  admin_settings:             restaurant.admin_settings,
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  allowed_origins:            restaurant.allowed_origins,
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  # Calculate seat count directly instead of using the private method
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
              1
            

            

                  current_seat_count:         restaurant.current_layout ? 
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                                              restaurant.current_layout.seat_sections.includes(:seats).flat_map(&:seats).count : 
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                                              0
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                }
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

            end

              def index
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "[SeatAllocationsController#index] params=#{params.inspect}"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                base = SeatAllocation.includes(:seat, :reservation, :waitlist_entry)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                                     .where(released_at: nil)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                if params[:date].present?
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    date_filter = Date.parse(params[:date])
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    # For a staff user:
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18.

      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19.

      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21.

      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22.

      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    end_local = start_local.end_of_day
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

    27.

      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29.

      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  rescue ArgumentError

      32.

      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33.

      34.

                seat_allocations = base.all

                results = seat_allocations.map do |alloc|

      43.

                  occupant_id         = nil

              # POST /seat_allocations/multi_create

              def multi_create
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                sa_params = params.require(:seat_allocation).permit(:occupant_type, :occupant_id, :start_time, :end_time, seat_ids: [])
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                occupant_type = sa_params[:occupant_type]
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                occupant_id   = sa_params[:occupant_id]
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                seat_ids      = sa_params[:seat_ids] || []
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                st = parse_time(sa_params[:start_time]) || Time.current
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                en = parse_time(sa_params[:end_time])
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                if occupant_type.blank? || occupant_id.blank? || seat_ids.empty?
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Must provide occupant_type, occupant_id, seat_ids" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                occupant = find_occupant(occupant_type, occupant_id)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                return unless occupant
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                en ||= default_end_time(occupant, st)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                if st >= en
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "start_time must be before end_time" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  # occupant => "seated" unless its already finished, canceled, etc.
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  occupant.update!(status: "seated") unless %w[seated finished canceled no_show removed].include?(occupant.status)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  seat_ids.each do |sid|
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    seat = Seat.find_by(id: sid) or raise ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound, "Seat #{sid} not found"
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    # *** Overlap check *** 
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    conflict = SeatAllocation.where(seat_id: sid, released_at: nil)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                                             .where("start_time < ? AND end_time > ?", en, st).exists?
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                    raise StandardError, "Seat #{sid} is not free" if conflict
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                    SeatAllocation.create!(
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                      seat_id:           seat.id,
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                      reservation_id:    occupant.is_a?(Reservation) ? occupant.id : nil,
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                      waitlist_entry_id: occupant.is_a?(WaitlistEntry) ? occupant.id : nil,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                      start_time:        st,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      end_time:          en,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      released_at:       nil
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    )
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                msg = "Seats allocated (seated) from #{st.strftime('%H:%M')} to #{en.strftime('%H:%M')} for occupant #{occupant.id}"
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                render json: { message: msg }, status: :created
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound, StandardError => e
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                render json: { error: e.message }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              # POST /seat_allocations/reserve
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              def reserve
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                ra_params = params.require(:seat_allocation).permit(:occupant_type, :occupant_id, :start_time, :end_time, seat_ids: [], seat_labels: [])
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                occupant_type = ra_params[:occupant_type]
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                occupant_id   = ra_params[:occupant_id]
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                seat_ids      = ra_params[:seat_ids] || []
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                seat_labels   = ra_params[:seat_labels] || []
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                st = parse_time(ra_params[:start_time]) || Time.current
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                en = parse_time(ra_params[:end_time])
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                # Convert seat_labels -> seat_ids if seat_ids is empty
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                if seat_ids.empty? && seat_labels.any?
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  seat_ids = seat_labels.map {|lbl| Seat.find_by(label: lbl)&.id }.compact
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                if occupant_type.blank? || occupant_id.blank? || seat_ids.empty?
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Must provide occupant_type, occupant_id, and at least one seat" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                occupant = find_occupant(occupant_type, occupant_id) or return
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                en ||= default_end_time(occupant, st)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                return render json: { error: "start_time must be before end_time" }, status: :unprocessable_entity if st >= en
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  # occupant => "reserved" unless its already seated, finished, etc.
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  occupant.update!(status: "reserved") unless %w[seated finished canceled no_show removed].include?(occupant.status)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  seat_ids.each do |sid|
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    seat = Seat.find_by(id: sid) or raise ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound, "Seat #{sid} not found"
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    conflict = SeatAllocation.where(seat_id: sid, released_at: nil)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                                             .where("start_time < ? AND end_time > ?", en, st).exists?
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    raise StandardError, "Seat #{sid} not free" if conflict
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                    SeatAllocation.create!(
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                      seat_id:           seat.id,
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                      reservation_id:    occupant.is_a?(Reservation) ? occupant.id : nil,
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                      waitlist_entry_id: occupant.is_a?(WaitlistEntry) ? occupant.id : nil,
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                      start_time:        st,
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                      end_time:          en,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                      released_at:       nil
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    )
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                msg = "Seats reserved from #{st.strftime('%H:%M')} to #{en.strftime('%H:%M')}."
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                render json: { message: msg }, status: :created
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound, StandardError => e
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                render json: { error: e.message }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

              # POST /seat_allocations/arrive
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              def arrive
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "[arrive] params=#{params.inspect}"
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                occ_params = params.permit(:occupant_type, :occupant_id)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                occupant_type = occ_params[:occupant_type]
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                occupant_id   = occ_params[:occupant_id]
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                if occupant_type.blank? || occupant_id.blank?
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Must provide occupant_type, occupant_id" },
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                                status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                occupant = find_occupant(occupant_type, occupant_id)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                return unless occupant
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  if occupant.is_a?(Reservation)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                    raise StandardError, "Not in reserved/booked" unless %w[reserved booked].include?(occupant.status)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  else
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    raise StandardError, "Not in waiting/reserved" unless %w[waiting reserved].include?(occupant.status)
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  occupant.update!(status: "seated")
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                render json: { message: "Arrived => occupant is now 'seated'" }, status: :ok
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                render json: { error: e.message }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              # POST /seat_allocations/no_show
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

              def no_show
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                ns_params = params.permit(:occupant_type, :occupant_id)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                occupant_type = ns_params[:occupant_type]
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                occupant_id   = ns_params[:occupant_id]
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                if occupant_type.blank? || occupant_id.blank?
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Must provide occupant_type, occupant_id" },
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                                status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                occupant = find_occupant(occupant_type, occupant_id)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                return unless occupant
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                  occupant_allocs = active_allocations_for(occupant_type, occupant.id)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  occupant_allocs.each { |alloc| alloc.update!(released_at: Time.current) }
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

            
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  occupant.update!(status: "no_show")
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                end
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                render json: { message: "Marked occupant as no_show; seat_allocations released" }, status: :ok
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

              end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

              # POST /seat_allocations/cancel
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

              def cancel
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                c_params = params.permit(:occupant_type, :occupant_id)
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                occupant_type = c_params[:occupant_type]
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                occupant_id   = c_params[:occupant_id]
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

            
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                if occupant_type.blank? || occupant_id.blank?
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Must provide occupant_type, occupant_id" },
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                                status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                end
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                occupant = find_occupant(occupant_type, occupant_id)
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                return unless occupant
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                  occupant_allocs = active_allocations_for(occupant_type, occupant.id)
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                  occupant_allocs.each { |alloc| alloc.update!(released_at: Time.current) }
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                  occupant.update!(status: "canceled")
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                end
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

            
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                render json: { message: "Canceled occupant & freed seats" }, status: :ok
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

              end
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

            
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

              # DELETE /seat_allocations/:id
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

              def destroy
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                seat_allocation = SeatAllocation.find(params[:id])
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                occupant = seat_allocation.reservation || seat_allocation.waitlist_entry
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                occupant_type = seat_allocation.reservation_id.present? ? "reservation" : "waitlist"
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

            
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  seat_allocation.update!(released_at: Time.current)
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  active_allocs = active_allocations_for(occupant_type, occupant.id)
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                  if active_allocs.none?
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                    occupant.update!(status: occupant_type == "reservation" ? "finished" : "removed")
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                  end
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                end
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

            
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                head :no_content
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

              end
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

            
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

              # POST /seat_allocations/finish
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

              def finish
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                f_params = params.permit(:occupant_type, :occupant_id)
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

            
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                occupant_type = f_params[:occupant_type]
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                occupant_id   = f_params[:occupant_id]
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                if occupant_type.blank? || occupant_id.blank?
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Must provide occupant_type, occupant_id" },
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                                status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                end
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

            
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                occupant = find_occupant(occupant_type, occupant_id)
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                return unless occupant
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

            
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                  occupant_allocs = active_allocations_for(occupant_type, occupant.id)
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                  occupant_allocs.each { |alloc| alloc.update!(released_at: Time.current) }
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

            
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                  new_status = occupant_type == "reservation" ? "finished" : "removed"
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                  occupant.update!(status: new_status)
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                end
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

            
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                render json: { message: "Occupant => #{occupant.status}; seats freed" }, status: :ok
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

              end
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

            
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

              private
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

            
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

              def parse_time(time_str)
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                return nil unless time_str.present?
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                Time.zone.parse(time_str) rescue nil
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

              end
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

            
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

              def find_occupant(occupant_type, occupant_id)
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                occupant = case occupant_type
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                           when "reservation" then Reservation.find_by(id: occupant_id)
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                           when "waitlist"    then WaitlistEntry.find_by(id: occupant_id)
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                           else nil
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

                           end
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

                render(json: { error: "Could not find occupant" }, status: :not_found) unless occupant
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                occupant
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

              end
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

            
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

              def default_end_time(occupant, start_time)
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                if occupant.is_a?(Reservation)
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                  (start_time || Time.current) + 60.minutes
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                else
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                  (start_time || Time.current) + 45.minutes
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                end
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

              end
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

            
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

              def active_allocations_for(occupant_type, occupant_id)
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

                if occupant_type == "reservation"
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

                  SeatAllocation.where(reservation_id: occupant_id, released_at: nil)
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

                else
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

                  SeatAllocation.where(waitlist_entry_id: occupant_id, released_at: nil)
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

                end
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

              end
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

            end
          
      339.

              def create

              def update

              def destroy
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                seat_section = SeatSection.find_by(id: params[:id])
          
      87.

                return head :no_content unless seat_section

              private
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              #-----------------------------------------------------------
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              # Example method to auto-generate seat records for a "table."
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

              # You can adapt the geometry or labeling as you wish.
          
      98.

              def auto_generate_table_seats(seat_section)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                # e.g. place them in a line, or a small circle around offset_x, offset_y
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                # We'll do a trivial line, each seat 40px right from the last:
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                base_x = 0
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                base_y = 0
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                (1..seat_section.capacity).each do |i|
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  seat_section.seats.create!(
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    label: "#{seat_section.name}#{i}",
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    position_x: base_x + 40 * (i - 1),  # e.g. horizontally spaced
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    position_y: base_y,
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    capacity: 1
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  )
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            end
          
      115.

            class SeatsController < ApplicationController

              def index

                if params[:seat_section_id]
          
      7.

              def create

              def update
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                seat = Seat.find_by(id: params[:id])
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                return render json: { error: "Seat not found" }, status: :not_found unless seat

              def destroy
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                seat = Seat.find_by(id: params[:id])
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                return head :no_content unless seat
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  SeatAllocation.where(seat_id: seat.id).destroy_all
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  seat.destroy
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                head :no_content
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              def bulk_update
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                # Expect an array of seat objects: [ { id: 1, label: "A1" }, { id: 2, label: "B1" }, ... ]
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                seat_params_array = params.require(:seats)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                updated_records = []
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                errors = []
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  seat_params_array.each do |seat_data|
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    safe_data = seat_data.permit(:id, :label, :position_x, :position_y, :capacity)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    seat = Seat.find_by(id: safe_data[:id])
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    unless seat
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                      errors << "Seat ID=#{safe_data[:id]} not found"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      next
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    # remove :id from the actual .update
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    unless seat.update(safe_data.except(:id))
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                      seat.errors.full_messages.each do |msg|
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                        errors << "Seat ID=#{seat.id} => #{msg}"
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80.

      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    else
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      updated_records << seat
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  raise ActiveRecord::Rollback if errors.any?
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                if errors.any?
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  render json: { errors: errors }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                else
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92.

              # POST /resend_code

              def resend_code
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                user = current_user
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                return render json: { error: "Unauthorized" }, status: :unauthorized unless user
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                # If they're already verified, no need to resend
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                if user.phone_verified?
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  return render json: { message: "Your phone is already verified" }, status: :ok
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                # If no phone, can't send
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                unless user.phone.present?
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "No phone number on file" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                # optional: throttle
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                if user.verification_code_sent_at && user.verification_code_sent_at > 1.minute.ago
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: "Please wait before requesting another code" }, status: :too_many_requests
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                # Generate a new code
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                new_code = generate_code
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                user.update(
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  verification_code: new_code,
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  verification_code_sent_at: Time.current
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                )
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                # Send new SMS
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                SendSmsJob.perform_later(
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  to:   user.phone,
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  body: "Your new verification code is #{new_code}",
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  from: "Hafaloha"
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                )
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                render json: { message: "Verification code resent. Check your messages." }, status: :ok
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142.

              # GET /profile

              def show_profile

              def update_profile
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                if params[:password].present?
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  current_user.password = params[:password]

    154.

      156.

              def index

                # Only staff/admin/super_admin can list the entire waitlist
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7.

      8.

    9.

      10.

      20.

      21.

      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      Time.zone.local(date_filter.year, date_filter.month, date_filter.day, 0, 0, 0)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    end_local = start_local.end_of_day
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    end_utc   = end_local.utc
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29.

                  rescue ArgumentError

              def create

    app/jobs/application_job.rb

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # Most jobs are safe to ignore if the underlying records are no longer available
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            end

    app/jobs/send_sms_job.rb

            # app/jobs/send_sms_job.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              1
            

            

            class SendSmsJob < ApplicationJob
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              1
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            

              def perform(to:, body:, from:)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # The actual call to your SMS client
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7.

              enum stock_status: {

              scope :currently_available, -> {

    42. 
            

            

                where(available: true)

                  .where(<<-SQL.squish, today: Date.current)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44.

      45.

    46. 
            

            

                      seasonal = TRUE

                      AND (available_from IS NULL OR available_from <= :today)
          
      48.

      49.

              # as_json => only expose category_ids, not full objects
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54.

              def as_json(options = {})
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                super(options).merge(
