      59.

                  'seasonal'             => seasonal,

                  'available_from'       => available_from,

                  'featured'             => featured,
          
      64.

              def active?
          
      14.

                (valid_from <= Time.now) && (valid_until.nil? || valid_until >= Time.now) &&
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15.

    16.

            # app/models/seat_allocation.rb

            class SeatAllocation < ApplicationRecord

              belongs_to :seat

              belongs_to :reservation, optional: true

              belongs_to :waitlist_entry, optional: true

              def generate_reset_password_token!
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
              5
            

            

                raw_token = SecureRandom.hex(10)

      59.

              def send_sms(phone_number, message, from = nil)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                # Use the approved sender ID if 'from' is not provided
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17.

                from ||= @approved_sender_id

                # Format the phone number
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
              3
            

            

                formatted_to = format_phone_number(phone_number)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                # Replace $ with USD symbol to avoid encoding issues
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
              3

                  messages: [
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    {
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                      source: 'ruby',

                # Basic Auth

                auth = Base64.strict_encode64("#{@username}:#{@api_key}")

    38. 
            
              3
            

            

                uri = URI("#{BASE_URL}/sms/send")

                http.use_ssl = true

                request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri, {

    51.

                  json = JSON.parse(response.body) rescue {}

    52. 
            

            

                  
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
              2

      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
              1

              def format_phone_number(phone)

                # Remove all non-digit characters except the + sign

    80.

            # app/services/wassenger_client.rb

            require 'net/http'
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            require 'json'
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            class WassengerClient
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              BASE_URL = 'https://api.wassenger.com/v1'
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              def initialize(api_token: ENV['WASSENGER_API_TOKEN'])
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @api_token = api_token
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              end
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def send_group_message(group_wid, message)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                uri = URI.parse("#{BASE_URL}/messages")
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                http.use_ssl = true
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                request['Token']        = @api_token  # Wassenger expects `Token: ...`
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                request.body = {
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  group:   group_wid,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  message: message
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  # You can also set "priority": "high", etc. if desired
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                }.to_json
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                response = http.request(request)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                # Optionally parse JSON:
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                parsed = JSON.parse(response.body) rescue {}
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[WassengerClient] group=#{group_wid} status=#{response.code} body=#{response.body}"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                if response.code.to_i >= 200 && response.code.to_i < 300
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  # success
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  parsed
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                else
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  # log or raise error
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "[WassengerClient] Error sending WhatsApp message: #{response.body}"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  parsed
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            end
          
      43.
